mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.vendor_register_sid, t.vendor_register_num, t.vendor_register_code, t.vendor_code, t.vendor_name, t.short_name, t.vendor_group, t.company_sid, t.relate_company_sid, t.customer_sid, t.original_vendor_sid, t.industry_code, t.vendor_category, t.vendor_type, t.business_nature, t.vendor_property, t.core_product, t.owner_name, t.credit_code, t.register_date, t.register_capital, t.register_capital_currency, t.country_region, t.on_market, t.with_testlab, t.is_agile_vendor, t.technical_grade, t.management_class, t.fixed_asset_value, t.fixed_asset_value_currency, t.equipment_asset_value, t.equipment_asset_currency, t.registerer, t.register_tel, t.register_email, t.output_value,t.output_value_currency,t.output_value_year, t.referrer, t.referrer_tel, t.credit_start_date, t.credit_end_date, t.internet_url, t.taxpayer_identify_number, t.invoice_tel, t.invoice_addr, t.register_addr, t.business_addr, t.business_scope, t.picture_path, t.bu_operator, t.bu_operator_vendor, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t2.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t3.nick_name AS updater_account_name, t4.nick_name AS confirmer_account_name, t5.company_code, t5.company_name, t6.company_code AS relate_company_code, t6.company_name AS relate_company_name, t7.customer_code, t7.customer_name, t8.vendor_code AS original_vendor_code, t8.vendor_name AS original_vendor_name, t9.approval_node,t9.approval_user_id,t9.approval_user_name,t9.create_date AS submit_date,t10.nick_name AS submit_user_name from s_bas_vendor_register t LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t2.user_name = t.creator_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t3.user_name = t.updater_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t4.user_name = t.confirmer_account LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t5 ON t.company_sid = t5.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t6 ON t.relate_company_sid = t6.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_customer t7 ON t.customer_sid = t7.customer_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t8 ON t.original_vendor_sid = t8.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN s_sys_form_process t9 ON t.vendor_register_sid = t9.form_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t10 ON t9.creator_account = t10.user_name
mapper.select:
and t9.approval_user_id in (#{approvalUserId})
and t9.approval_user_id = #{approvalUserId}
and (t.client_id like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.vendor_register_num like concat('%', #{vendorRegisterNum}, '%')
and t.handle_status in (#{handleStatus})
and t.vendor_category in (#{vendorCategory})
and t.vendor_property in (#{vendorProperty})
and t.vendor_register_code =#{vendorRegisterCode}
and (t.vendor_code like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.vendor_name like concat('%', #{vendorName}, '%')
and t.short_name like concat('%', #{shortName}, '%')
and (t.vendor_group like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.company_sid =#{companySid}
and t.relate_company_sid =#{relateCompanySid}
and t.customer_sid =#{customerSid}
and t.original_vendor_sid =#{originalVendorSid}
and (t.industry_code like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.vendor_category like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.vendor_type like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.business_nature like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.vendor_property like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.core_product like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.owner_name like concat('%', #{ownerName}, '%')
and (t.credit_code like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.register_date = #{registerDate}
and t.register_capital = #{registerCapital}
and ( t.register_capital_currency like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.country_region =#{countryRegion}
and (t.on_market like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.with_testlab like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.is_agile_vendor like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.technical_grade like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.management_class like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.fixed_asset_value = #{fixedAssetValue}
and ( t.fixed_asset_value_currency like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.equipment_asset_value = #{equipmentAssetValue}
and ( t.equipment_asset_currency like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.registerer like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.register_email like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.register_tel like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.referrer like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.referrer_tel like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.credit_start_date = #{creditStartDate}
and t.credit_end_date = #{creditEndDate}
and (t.internet_url like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and ( t.taxpayer_identify_number like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.invoice_tel like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.invoice_addr like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.register_addr like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.business_addr like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.business_scope like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.picture_path like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.bu_operator like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.bu_operator_vendor like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.handle_status like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and (t.creator_account like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and date_format(t.create_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(t.create_date,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
and (t.updater_account like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.update_date = #{updateDate}
and (t.confirmer_account like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.confirm_date = #{confirmDate}
and (t.data_source_sys like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
${params.dataScope}
order by t.create_date desc
mapper.insert:
insert into s_bas_vendor_register
client_id, vendor_register_sid, vendor_name, short_name, vendor_group, company_sid, relate_company_sid, customer_sid, original_vendor_sid, industry_code, vendor_category, vendor_type, business_nature, vendor_property, core_product, owner_name, credit_code, register_date, register_capital, register_capital_currency, country_region, on_market, with_testlab, is_agile_vendor, technical_grade, management_class, fixed_asset_value, fixed_asset_value_currency, equipment_asset_value, equipment_asset_currency, output_value, output_value_currency, output_value_year, registerer, register_tel, register_email, referrer, referrer_tel, credit_start_date, credit_end_date, internet_url, taxpayer_identify_number, invoice_tel, invoice_addr, register_addr, business_addr, business_scope, picture_path, bu_operator, bu_operator_vendor, remark, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, updater_account, update_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys,
values
#{item.clientId}, #{item.vendorRegisterSid}, #{item.vendorName}, #{item.shortName}, #{item.vendorGroup}, #{item.companySid}, #{item.relateCompanySid}, #{item.customerSid}, #{item.originalVendorSid}, #{item.industryCode}, #{item.vendorCategory}, #{item.vendorType}, #{item.businessNature}, #{item.vendorProperty}, #{item.coreProduct}, #{item.ownerName}, #{item.creditCode}, #{item.registerDate}, #{item.registerCapital}, #{item.registerCapitalCurrency}, #{item.countryRegion}, #{item.onMarket}, #{item.withTestlab}, #{item.isAgileVendor}, #{item.technicalGrade}, #{item.managementClass}, #{item.fixedAssetValue}, #{item.fixedAssetValueCurrency}, #{item.equipmentAssetValue}, #{item.equipmentAssetCurrency}, #{item.outputValue}, #{item.outputValueCurrency}, #{item.outputValueYear}, #{item.registerer}, #{item.registerTel}, #{item.registerEmail}, #{item.referrer}, #{item.referrerTel}, #{item.creditStartDate}, #{item.creditEndDate}, #{item.internetUrl}, #{item.taxpayerIdentifyNumber}, #{item.invoiceTel}, #{item.invoiceAddr}, #{item.registerAddr}, #{item.businessAddr}, #{item.businessScope}, #{item.picturePath}, #{item.buOperator}, #{item.buOperatorVendor}, #{item.remark}, #{item.handleStatus}, #{item.creatorAccount}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updaterAccount}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.confirmerAccount}, #{item.confirmDate}, #{item.dataSourceSys},
